lead_paragraph: The trials of Jim Tressel and Ohio State will prove to be a test of the N.C.A.A.’s commitment to policing its ranks.
snippet: The trials of Jim Tressel and Ohio State will prove to be a test of the N.C.A.A.’s commitment to policing its ranks.
